mapper.insert: INSERT seminar (seminar_id, turning_class_id, max_team_num, round_id, sign_start_time, sign_end_time, # report_end_time, status, sign_order) VALUE (#{seminrId}, #{turningClassId}, #{roundId}, #{maxTeamNum}, #{signStartTime}, #{signEndTime}, 0, #{signOrder})
mapper.select: SELECT seminar_id as seminarId, turning_class_id as turningClassId, round_id as roundId, max_team_num as maxTeamNum, sign_start_time as signStartTime, sign_end_time as signEndTime, report_end_time as reportEndTime, status, presentation_no as presentationNo, sign_order as signOrder FROM seminar WHERE seminar_id = #{seminarId} AND turning_class_id = #{turningClassId}
